Document the following for suspicious processes...
......times (creation, modified, accessed)
......get the PID
......get the parent and child process' names and PIDs
......which username / account were the processes running under
......the command line parameters for processes that use them
......location that they are being executed from
......any associated outbound/inbound connections: Src/Dst IPs/Ports
......spelling
......file hash
......their digital signatures
